team.previewSlogan: We are a  team of specialists around the world
team.previewText: Our employees work best because they can create where they feel most comfortable

about.previewSlogan: We help your business achieve new goals
about.previewText: Clients come to us when they have a great idea, but need a team of experts to help them bring it to life
about.leftText: The best talent, no matter where you are
about.rightText: MoraMora company was founded not so long ago. The actual idea came suddenly as one of the respectable wholesale trading companies was looking for a contractor to implement a quite large and ambitious project - to develop their own custom sales managing system from zero level. From the first days we successfully managed to gather together the team of enthusiastic professionals who a contractor to implement a quite large and ambitious project - to develop their own custom sales managing system from zero level. whatwedo.previewSlogan: We create custom digital product for each company
whatwedo.previewText: Using contemporary development technologies we transform your ideas into real business value
whatwedo.commonText: “Each new day is a new opportunity to create digital products. And that's exactly what we like”

firstProcessBlock.title: Briefing
firstProcessBlock.description: Send us a detailed briefing including the following information: who you are / core values / business goals / target group / what you are selling / required features / scope of the project or sitemap / timeframe and deadlines / examples of other sites you like.

secondProcessBlock.title: Concept
secondProcessBlock.description: We will have an in-depth looks at your briefing and evaluate whether the project fits both parties conditions and requirements. If it’s a match, we will have a meeting to discuss how to proceed.

thirdProcessBlock.title: Design
thirdProcessBlock.description: We will have an in-depth looks at your briefing and evaluate whether the project fits both parties conditions and requirements. If it’s a match, we will have a meeting to discuss how to proceed.

fourthProcessBlock.title: Development
fourthProcessBlock.description: We will have an in-depth looks at your briefing and evaluate whether the project fits both parties conditions and requirements. If it’s a match, we will have a meeting to discuss how to proceed.

home.descriptionWhiteBlock: Our goal is to assist businesses in achieving a leading position in their respective industries. We strive to make our clients stand out from their top competitors and ensure their satisfaction by leaving no stone unturned in the process. Our mission is fueled by a perfect combination of passion, dedication, and a generous amount of caffeine, which is crucial in aiding our efforts. Ultimately, we aim to bring a smile to our clients' faces as they see the positive results of our work.

whatBox1.title: Software & App Development
whatBox1.description: Our software developers will take your ideas to the next innovation level, from automation to artificial intelligence we are here to help. Through our complete website solutions we provide web translation services so you can reach your audience.
